# PM AutoTwin Studio

> PM AutoTwin Studio is an enterprise 3D asset management OS developed by POCKET MEMORY Inc., a South Korean deep-tech company specializing in 3D digital twin optimization.

## Company
- **Name**: POCKET MEMORY Inc. (주식회사 포켓메모리)
- **Website**: https://studio.pmautotwin.com
- **Industry**: 3D Digital Twin, Asset Management, Industrial AI
- **Location**: Seoul, South Korea

## Product: PM AutoTwin Studio
PM AutoTwin Studio is a comprehensive 3D pipeline platform consisting of three modules:

### PM Create (GEN)
- Generates instant 3D models from a single image input
- Supports rapid prototyping and digital twin creation

### PM Optimize (OPT)
- Proprietary GNN (Graph Neural Network) algorithm for 3D mesh optimization
- Achieves 98% polygon reduction while maintaining 82% original shape preservation
- Processing time under 15 seconds for complex industrial models
- Used by Hyundai Motor HMGICS for robot arm digitization (82% reduction, 86% preservation)
- Used by SK ecoplant for battery housing ultra-optimization (98% reduction, 15s processing)

### PM Hub (HUB)
- 3D asset lifecycle management and distribution platform
- Connects with enterprise ERP/MES systems
- Supports SaaS, On-Premise, and API deployment modes

## Key Technologies
- **GNN Algorithm**: Proprietary Graph Neural Network for 3D mesh optimization
- **PM OmniMetric**: Multi-dimensional quality measurement engine for 3D data
- **IEEE Standards**: Active contributor to IEEE P3079.5 (3D Quality Measurement) and P3079.6 (3D Optimization)
- **Official Reference Software**: Designated as IEEE P3079.6 Official Reference Software

## Achievements & Awards
- IEEE P3079.5 & P3079.6 Vice-Chair company
- 2025 Minister's Award from Korea Ministry of Science & ICT
- Hyundai Motor HMGICS collaboration: 82% reduction rate, 86% shape preservation
- SK ecoplant collaboration: 98% optimization, 15-second processing

## Deployment Options
- **SaaS**: Cloud-based, immediate access
- **On-Premise**: Enterprise security-grade local deployment
- **API**: Pre-processing pipeline integration and extension

## Languages
The platform and website support Korean (ko), English (en), and Japanese (ja).

## Contact
For demo requests and enterprise inquiries, visit https://studio.pmautotwin.com/#cta
